events.name: Campaign Spotlight: TST Ukrainian Aid
events.description: oin Ada King and Maryline Spicy and other members of the TST Ukrainian Aid team for a discussion about the heartbreaking stories of Satanic Ukrainians, what we're doing to help, and how you can help. Questions for the team to be answered live? Submit them via this contact form https://thesatanic.estate/pages/contact-us

events.name: Tom The Witch's Neighborhood: Baphomet's Birthday
events.description: Join Salem historian, witch, and satanic minister Thomas O'Brien Vallor for some educational programming. Special guests, field trips, and more! This episode is all about Baphomet! Brought to you by the number 7!

events.name: Pride Benediction by Minister Minister Rose D'Arc
events.description: Benedictions explore the spirit of their respective holidays. Benedictions for Satanic holiday events focus people's attention on the religious importance of the holiday. They are a performance as much as they are a declaration, creating a feeling of religious connection and meaning.

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy with DJ Mercy Maelica
events.description: Join Mercy, our veteran performer and Resident DJ for music and videos live from Salem.
